name: Fuel Finder
description:
This is an action rail, game. You play as a character named Ethan who is trying to escape a malevolent force trying to take his special blood. He is from a planet known as Celestia. He has crashed on a desert planet and must find three Fuel Flames to power his ship. Help him find the Fuel Flames to fuel his ship and escape this desert planet to return to his home world.

Code by Michael Baker from the University of Texas at Austin
